title: Motto Midara ni Shitsukemashou
original_name: もっと淫らに躾ましょう
sinopse:
1. Sore ga Hisho no Shigoto desu!
2. Motto Midara ni Shitsukemashou!
3. Yokubari na Migite (A Greedy Right Hand)
4. Miwaku no Counseling (Fascinating Counseling)
5. 1000-man Dollar no Koibito (10 Million Dollar Lover)
6. Ganjigarame ni Aishite ne (I Love You Firmly Bound)
7. Himitsu no Jouji wa Hishoshitsu de
